docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. 1 2 3 4 from fluid import Signal signal = Signal ( 10 ) print ( signal ()) >>> 10 TEST with a long string C++ 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 from fluid.signal import Signal , batch n1 = Signal ( 1 ) n2 = Signal ( 2 ) with batch : n1 . assign ( 4 ) n2 . assign ( 5 ) #include <iostream> int main ( void ) { std :: cout << "Hello world!" << std :: endl ; return 0 ; }
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
